name: Horn Rider
text: You can defend yourself using the horn or tusk of a creature you’re lashed to.
benefit: You gain a +1 shield bonus to AC when lashed into a horn harness.
special: A creature with this feat can take the Mounted Archery feat without possessing 1 rank in the Ride skill or the Mounted Combat feat.
text_zh: 你可以利用坐骑的巨角或獠牙防护自己。
benefit_zh: 在使用角兽缰绳（见下）控制坐骑时，你在防御等级上获得+1盾牌加值。
special_zh: 如果你拥有此专长，你可以将其作为选择骑乘射手专长的前提，忽略原本需要的在骑术技能上拥有至少一个等级的要求。
